name: Support System
description: Support System is a Web Application. It can be used for office purposes. Where if User will face problem and he/she can't get out from here or Need authority help or permission then User can generate Ticket then Admin will say something to this User by sending Message to solve that problem. Any User can't get in Admin Route. Because I used JWT to secure Admin Route.
feture: Two Route. One for User another for Admin. For Authentication I used Firebase
When User face any problem for there task then they can generate a Ticket to notify Admin. And then Admin will take action according to Ticket
Users can generate Three types of Tickets based on Priority. Like High, Medium and Low. If Ticket status is High it means this is emergency case

After notifying this problem Admin can send a Message to user what he/she have to do to solve this problem. Admin will be allow to see all user Ticket. But the User just will be able to see those Ticket that are he/she created

clientReviews.review: Working with Artur has been a pleasure. Better yet - I alerted them of a minor issue before going to sleep. The issue was fixed the next morning. I couldn't ask for better support. Thank you Artur! This is easily a 5 star freelancer.

name: Dancy!
description: Dancy is a Dance training website. Students can learn different types of dance with experience Instructors.
feture: Three Route. One for Student, One for Instructor another for Admin. For Authentication I used Firebase

Instructors can add New Classes. When the Instructor adds a class then this class status will be Pending. And as long as the status is Pending no student can see this class. Just only can see Admin and Instructor. To take next action
Admin can Approve or Deny this class. If Admin Approved then this class will be published for all. If Admin deny then, Admin will send a message with denying this class why that class is Deny
Admin can make someone Instructor to Admin. And Instructor can delete or edit just his/her classes

name: Kids Doy
description: Kids Doy is an Online Toy Shop. You can buy your toy from here.
feture: Two Route. One for User another for Admin. For Authentication I used Firebase
User can add toy to his/her cart. Then he can pay for this toy
Admin can add New toy, deleate existing Toy.
